messages.subject: Family Crests and the Shinsen-gumi
messages.msgSnippet: I was wondering about the different family crests, I thought the family crests to what family you re from. I also want some information on the Shinsen-gumi,
messages.messageBody:
I was wondering about the different family crests, I thought the
family crests to what family you're from. I also want some information
on the Shinsen-gumi, I'm trying to write a short biography of Saitou
Hajime and I'm at a dead end, please help me.
